Uses of Interface
de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch.Batch

  • Packages that use Batch 
    Package Description
    de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch  

    • Uses of Batch in de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch

      Classes in de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch that implement Batch 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArcBatch
      An arc batch is a number of arc rendered with the same line style.
      class  BeginPathBatch 
      class  ChangeCompositeOperationBatch 
      class  ColorQuadBatch
      A ColorQuadBatch stores 2d quads with vertex color at each vertex.
      class  CustomShaderBatch
      This is not really a batch but a state change of the current custom Shader.
      class  EndPathBatch 
      class  LinearGradientQuadBatch
      A linear gradient batch renders a quad filled with a linear gradient.
      class  LineBatch
      A line batch is a number of lines rendered with the same cap and join styles.
      class  TextureBatch
      A TextureBatch stores textured Quads with vertex colors.
      class  TriangleFanBatch
      A triangle fan batch.
